alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Beaches; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 06 at 1:23PM PST until January 08 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 15 to 20 feet with dangerous rip currents. Minor coastal flooding from spillover and wave run-up near beaches during early morning high tide. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Beaches and Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Powerful waves and strong rip currents will pose an exceptional risk of ocean drowning and damage to coastal structures like piers and jetties. Large breaking waves can cause injury, wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats near shore.
info.instruction: Everyone should remain out of the water due to life-threatening surf conditions. Stay off of jetties, piers, and other water side infrastructure.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Beaches; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches
